title: Foundational Course on Federated Learning Optimization: Network Resource Management Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic machine learning concepts and principles of distributed learning
context.additional_context: Mobile learning environment emphasizing project-based assessment, providing federated learning optimization experiences under real network constraints

learning_goals: A client grouping strategy utilizing a 2-hop communication protocol in environments with limited network resources can be designed.
In a hierarchical federated learning structure, adaptive client selection criteria can be applied to propose resource allocation plans for real-world scenarios.
Optimization strategies for federated learning parameter transmission, considering mobile device constraints, can be validated with experimental data.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
